metadata.synopsis: AD that triggers when you speak to another Avatar's Companion or talk to an unrecruited companion that's been perma bonded to another avatar. The companion won't talk to you and might mention that they've already signed up with someone else. Can be one line or multiple lines if you want to add some variety.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: You seem nice and all, but I've teamed up with someone else.
